snippet: The only real hope for additional stock gains this year, many investment strategists say, is expansion in the market’s price-to-earnings ratio.
abstract: Paul J Lim Fundamentally column observes that many investment strategists say the only real hope for additional stock gains in 2012 is expansion in the market’s price-to-earnings ratio.
lead_paragraph: The only real hope for additional stock gains this year, many investment strategists say, is expansion in the market’s price-to-earnings ratio.

headline.seo: Corporate Profits Have Stalled. Has the Market?
headline.main: Profits Have Stalled. Has the Market?
headline.print_headline: Profits Have Stalled. Has the Market?
